#include<iostream>
#include<string.h>
using namespace std;
 
 
 
 
int main()
{
char str[150],s[150],c;int i,j,k=0,l,m=0;
int t;
cin>>t;
scanf("%c",&c);
while(t--)
{
cin.getline(str,150);
l=strlen(str);
k=0;
m=0;
for(i=0;i<=l;i++)
{
if(str[i]==' ' || str[i]=='\0')
{
m=0;
for(j=k;j<i;j++)
{
s[m]=str[j];
m++;
}
s[m]='\0';
if(strcmp(s,"gr8")==0)
{
cout<<"great ";
}
else if(strcmp(s,"8")==0)
{
cout<<"ate ";
}
else if(strcmp(s,"w8")==0)
{
cout<<"wait ";
}
else if(strcmp(s,"4")==0)
{
cout<<"for ";
}
else if(strcmp(s,"b4")==0)
{
cout<<"before ";
}
else
{
cout<<s<<" ";
}
k=i+1;
}
}
cout<<"\n";
}
}
